notesStmt.note: The title page is engraved; the "te" in "complainte" is a monogram.
"Mœoniæ", "Marie Magdalens funerall teares", "The triumphs ouer death", and "Short rules of good life" each have separate title page; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Some print faded and show-thorough; pages stained and tightly bound. C12v-D11r, N12V-O12r, and V12v-end from the Bodleian Library copy spliced at end.
